summary: This mod changes everything that can respawn so that it will respawn within 3 days
descriptionHtml:
This mod makes everything respawn in 3 days instead of the vanilla 10 days!

And with everything I really mean everything! Bandits, Plants, Items, Animals, Dungeons. You name it!

That means: more elk to kill! More bandits to kill! More plants to collect!

Likes, favorites and subs are always apreciated and makes making this mod just for you all worth the trouble! :)

This is a modified version of our origional mod that also allows ores to respawn within 3 days

Many thanks to Arthedain for his help and support with this mod!

To download on the steam workshop visitÂ http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=258858691


Thanks for all you support!
author: Mw_NoGodsNoHeroes
